td.span: <!-- Jump to the reminder creation if Text and Time have been provided -->
<!-- Ask for reminder text if it was not provided -->

tr.td: <context if="empty($Text)" modal="true"> <!-- This context is modal because any text must be interpreted as reminder text -->
<output value="What would you like me to remind you about?"/>
<context id="reminder_time" if="empty($Time)"/> <!-- Ask for the Date and Time -->
<context id="reminder"/> <!-- Or create a reminder if the Time was provided -->

td.span: <!-- Ask for the Time if it was not provided -->
<!-- The user may provide both Date and Time -->

tr.td: <output value="When should I remind you about this?" if="empty($Date)"/>

td.span: <!-- Or ask only for the Time if the Date was provided -->

tr.td: <output value="Please tell me the reminder time"/>

td.span: <!-- This context contains no inputs, it only contains actions -->
<!-- Format date string if it is not empty -->
<!-- Just response with text, date and time of a new reminder -->

tr.td: <output value='OK, I will remind you "$Text" on $Fmt at $Time'/>

body.div: You can't perform that action at this time.
